title: Pharmacologist Job at Kiyix Recruitment Hub
content:
Kiyix Recruitment Hub is a recruitment/HR consulting firm and our goal is to to help create one million jobs in Nigeria by 2030. At Kiyix recruitment hub, we help make recruitment a stress-free experience for both the employer and the potential job seekers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Pharmacologist

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Pharmaceutical / Retail Pharmacy

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Pharmacologist will support the pharmacy operations.
	The ideal candidate must have hands-on experience working in a community or hospital pharmacy and solid knowledge of drug interactions, dispensing practices, and patient counseling.


Key Responsibilties


	Participate in pharmacy operations, including drug dispensing and patient counseling where needed.
	Review prescriptions for accuracy, dosage, and potential drug interactions.
	Provide professional guidance on drug usage, side effects, and contraindications.
	Maintain accurate records, inventory, and documentation.
	Stay updated on new drug discoveries, pharmacy best practices, and regulatory changes.


Requirements & Qualifications


	BSc Degree in Pharmacology, or related fields
	Minimum of 1- 3 years of experience working in a pharmacy (community or hospital).
	Strong understanding of pharmacology, drug mechanisms, and pharmacokinetics.
	Practical knowledge of drug dispensing, inventory management, and prescription handling.
	Ability to counsel patients professionally.
	Excellent analytical, communication, and problem-solving skills.
	High level of integrity and attention to detail.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 monthly (plus Accommodation).

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: kicvacancy@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
Or
WhatsApp to 09063916949, stating the job role as the subject.
